Social Media Consultations

Social media marketing is evolving quickly, and it is hard to know what you need, or where to spend your energy.

In these limited sessions we are offering a unique opportunity for a one-on-one session with our social media scout, Jen Evison, to review your social media channels and situation.

For 1.5 hours you can discuss your situation and requirements with Jen, and she will provide as much insight and support as she can, along with any recommendations for further tools or training.

Bring along all log in details and any existing resources, and let one of Adelaide’s leading social media marketers help you.

Further training sessions are not essential, however should you book a social media training workshop within 6 months of consultation, we will discount the full value of the consultation off the training price (must be redeemed by the same person).

Don’t miss this opportunity for dedicated time with a skilled social media professional!

Be prepared to do your best. Book your spot.

Your social media marketing trainer:

Jen Evison – from Jennifer Evison Consulting.

Jen has extensive experience in the social media space and is renowned for her food and beverage marketing. Previously, she managed the social media channels for Allrecipes in the US before moving to Australia and continues to work with Australian and US businesses helping them achieve social media success over the past decade, including a prominent wine brand.

With tertiary qualifications in business marketing, she has a genuine talent for strategising, being across best practice and creatively discovering and constructing effective content for a range of social media channels.

Jen has an unending enthusiasm for presenting and participants will be delighted by her effervescent and good humoured nature.

See Jen's workshops here.

Consultation details:

Social media consultations

Know you need some kind of social media training but not sure what kind, or where to start? Book a dedicated one-on-one session with social media scout, Jen, to review your situation and determine your needs.

Duration: 1.5 hours

Date: Thursday 5 July, Wednesday 11 July 2018

Times: Various times, limited places

Location: Intersect, 167 Flinders Street, Adelaide, South Australia

Cost: $150 + BF + GST

Join Now

The training venue

Our training sessions are held in modern meeting rooms which are conveniently located in the Adelaide CBD.

Please note: You will need to bring your own laptop.

Intersect
167 Flinders Street
Adelaide, South Australia
